name: Aged Vampire Hunter
quote: “The cardinal rule of hunting vampires is that 1 vampire is much easier to kill then 10.”
abilities: Defense = 6 against ‘Vampire’ Attacks.
title: Satanic

name: Annoying Little Brother
quote: “You better take me with you or I’ll tell mom you’re a bloodsucking vampire!”
title: Subterranean

name: Big Dumb Jock
quote: “Dude, beer me.”
title: Crypt

name: Bookish Girl With No Boyfriend
quote: “No that’s okay. You guys go skinny dipping. I’ll just stay here and read…”
abilities: Bookish Girl is immune to these cards: “We’ve Seen Your Breasts, Now You Must Die!”, “Let’s Go Skinny Dipping”, and “Only the Virgin Survives”.
title: Virgin

name: Coed Science Major
quote: “There’s nothing like it in the fossil record.” “But how do we stop it?” “Why are you asking ME?”
title: Girlfriend

name: Cop
quote: “I unloaded into it at point blank range. POINT BLANK! What was that thing?”
abilities: Defense of ‘Gun’ Props played on the Cop are doubled.
title: Cyborg

name: Creepy Old Inkeeper
quote: “I guess you’ll be wantin’ to take a shower…”
abilities: May be played as a ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack with a 7 Attack instead.
title: Devil

name: High School Vice Principal
quote: “I’ve  had just about enough of your antics, mister… say, is that a tentacle?”
title: Heathen

name: Military Officer
quote: “I’m sorry, but that’s classified on a need to know basis.” “That thing just ate a whole town! I think that I need to know!”
abilities: You may give the Military Officer 2 Props per turn as long as one of them is a ‘Weapon’.
title: Beyond

name: Mom
quote: “Come here, baby. Momma’s gonna make it all better.”
abilities: Gets +1 Defense for each ‘Young’ Character in the same Movie. Mom can be played as a ‘Psycho Killer’ with a 7 Attack instead.
title: Mars

name: Nymphomaniac Cheerleader
quote: “Oh, no! I don’t want to die a virgin!” “You’re a virgin?!” “Look, do you want to get some or not?”
abilities: All ‘Males’ in the same Movie as the Nympho add +1 to their Defense.
title: Woman

name: Old Priest
quote: “Holy Christ, you scared the bejesus outta me!”
abilities: Defense = 6 against ‘Supernatural’ Attacks.
title: Maniac

name: Park Ranger
quote: “Relax, I know these woods like the back of my hand.” “They why are we lost?”
title: Mysterious

name: Robot
quote: “Danger! Danger! My arms are flailing! My arms are flailing!”
abilities: Discard 3 cards to stop one of your ‘Young’ Characters from being killed.
title: Massacre

name: Skippy The Wonder Dog
quote: “What’s that, Skippy? Billy’s torso is down the well?”
abilities: May not use Props.
title: Sinister

name: Space Bounty Hunter
quote: “See that cute little thing? It’ll eat your face.”
abilities: Defense = 8 against ‘Alien’ Attacks.
title: Grave Robbers

name: Spoiled Little Rich Girl
quote: “Billy may have come camping with you, but he’s going home with ME… or in a body bag…”
abilities: While she is in your Movie, you fill your hand to 7 cards at the start of your turn.
title: Vampire

name: The Baby Sitter
quote: “You kids stay here; I’ll see what that noise was…”
abilities: Defense = 4 if you have the “Annoying Little Brother” in your Movie.
title: Night

name: The Guy Everyone Knows Will Get Killed
quote: “I know there’s a killer somewhere out there, so I’m going to wander around alone in the dark…”
abilities: If there is a choice of Characters to kill in your Movie, this card must be chosen first.
title: Radioactive

name: The Janitor
quote: “You wouldn’t believe the things people throw away…”
abilities: Discard 2 cards to take any Prop from the discard pile and give it to the Janitor, even if you played a Prop on him this turn.
title: Thing

name: The Nervous Girl
quote: “We’re all going to die! We’re all going to die!” SMACK! “Thanks, I needed that.”
title: Witch

name: The Prom Queen
quote: “The pig’s blood really brings out her eyes.”
abilities: The Prom Queen cannot be killed in an Attack unless she is in “The High School”.
title: Rampage

name: The Reporter
quote: “That’s some story, kid. Now why should I believe… say, is that a tentacle?”
abilities: Once during your turn you may discard 1 card to look at another player’s hand.
title: Revenge

name: Arachnophobia
quote: “Where’s Bill Shatner when you need him?”
title: Alien

name: Blob Monster
quote: “C’mon, there’s always room for Jello!”
title: Haunted

name: Bloodsucking Fiends
quote: “Ze blud iss ze life!”
title: Damned

name: Carnivore Slugs
quote: “Ewwww, why is my seat all slimy!”
title: Dreadful

name: Dracula
quote: AB negative… My favorite vintage”
abilities: If Dracula’s Attack is successful, you may discard a Creature card to put Dracula back in your hand.
title: Dracula

name: Grave Robbers From Outer Space
quote: “Stupid Earthlings. See how they bury their dead instead of harvesting their parts for science… and soup!”
title: Forbidden

name: I Was A Teenage Werewolf
quote: “Hey, buddy, we’ve got leash laws in this town.”
title: Evil

name: Killer Toys
quote: “It’s a DOLL! Why don’t you just kick it across the floor?” “We can do that?”
abilities: If Killer Toys fail in their Attack, you may put them back in your hand (but you can’t use them again this turn).
title: Space

name: Mad Scientist
quote: “And they called me mad at the community college…”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to triple the current strength of a Creature attack.
title: Dungeon

name: Masked Stalker
quote: “Is that a chainsaw in your pocket or are you just glad to see me?”
abilities: May use ‘Weapon’ Props to boost the Attack Strength.
title: Coed

name: Mummy
quote: “Just kook at how beautifully preserved he is… GAK!”
abilities: Attack automatically succeeds if the Movie’s Location is “The Tomb”.
title: Hitler

name: Pod People
quote: “Join us… join us… Come on, just join us already!”
abilities: If the Attack is successful, instead of killing a Character, all of the Characters currently in that opponent’s Movie become yours.
title: Swarm

name: Say, Is That A Tentacle?
quote: “Okay, who ordered the sushi platter?
title: Tentacle

name: Severed Body Parts
quote: “Is that your hand on my thigh?”
title: Pagan

name: Space Critters
quote: “Awwww, it’s so cute, yes it is… Ahhhhh! It ate my face!”
title: Sorority

name: Space Mimic From Uranus
quote: “Don’t worry, buddy, I’m right behind you.”
abilities: If Mimic kills a Character, it takes its place (DS, traits). At the end of each of that player’s turns, it automatically kills and takes over another of his Characters. When that player has no more Characters, the Mimic dies.
title: Secret

name: Subterranean Cannibals
quote: “Anybody else think this clown tastes funny?”
title: Brain

name: The Gym Teacher
quote: “Everyone knows these guys work for Satan.”
abilities: When this card is played, choose whether it is an ‘Alien’ or ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack. May use ‘Weapon’ Props to boost Attack.
title: Cannibal

name: Zombies From Hell
quote: “Brains… Brains!”
title: Clutches

name: Abandoned Building
quote: “Looks spooky.” “Yeah, but maybe they have a phone.”
title: Mutant

name: Alien HQ
quote: “Shhh.” “I didn’t say anything.” “That wasn’t me… I think it was the door.”
abilities: The Alien HQ’s Defense = -5 against ‘Alien’ Attacks.
title: Intergalactic

name: Back Seat Of The Car
quote: “Billy, noooo. Stop it… Well, okay, just this once… say is that a tentacle?”
title: Boyfriend

name: Camp Lake Zirconia
quote: “I’ve never seen a summer camp that has its own morgue before…”
abilities: 'Psycho Killer’ Attacks always succeed at Camp Lake Zirconia.
title: Return

name: Laboratory
quote: “It’s alive, ALIVE!!”
abilities: During your turn you may discard 3 cards to take one Character out of the discard pile and bring it back to life in your Movie. The Character gains the trait ‘Dumb’ and cannot use Props.
title: Invaders

name: Old Church
quote: “We’re on a mission from God.”
abilities: After filling your hand at the start of your turn, you must discard 1 card or the Old Church burns down. It is also removed if you every skip or lose a turn.”
title: Unholy

name: The Basement
quote: “Hmm, I wonder what’s down here?”
abilities: The Basement can only be added to an existing Location. Defense = -1 against ‘Psycho Killer’ Attacks.
title: Invisible

name: The Cabin In The Woods
quote: “Did you leave the door open when we left?” “Must have been the wind…”
abilities: The Cabin’s Defense = -4 against ‘Psycho Killer’ Attacks.
title: Grave

name: The Funhouse
quote: “Doot-do-do-do-do-do doot-do-do-do-do-do…”
abilities: On your turn, you may discard 3 cards to exchange one of your Characters (and its Props) for a Character (and its Props) from another Movie.
title: Carnival

name: The High School
quote: “I’m not going back. That place is full of mutants and monsters!” “But, darling, you have to, you’re the Principal.”
abilities: Defense = +5 if you have the “High School Vice Principal” in your Movie. Against “The Gym Teacher”, Defense = -5.
title: Orgy

name: The House By The Cemetery
quote: “What’s it like living next to a cemetery?” “Quiet, usually…”
abilities: Against ‘Zombie’ and ‘Vampire’ Attacks Defense = -3.
title: Undead

name: The Sorority House
quote: “Teeheehee! Let’s have a pillow fight in our underwear.”
abilities: The Sorority House’s Defense = -3 against ‘Psycho Killer’ Attacks.
title: Teenage

name: The Tomb
quote: “The inscription reads, ‘All who enter the eternal resting place of Ratep shall suffer a most hideous death…’ Okay, let’s go in!”
abilities: Against ‘Supernatural’ Attacks, The Tomb’s Defense = -5.
title: Terror

name: Axe
quote: “Heeeeeeeeeeeere’s Johnny!”
title: Fifty Foot

name: Book Of The Dead
quote: “Klatuu! Verata!… Necktie!”
abilities: When the Book is on a ‘Smart’ Character, you may discard 2 cards to stop any ‘Supernatural’ Attack made against your Movie.
title: Flesheating

name: Chainsaw
quote: “Groovy!”
abilities: You may play this on a ‘Psycho Killer’ to give it +12 Attack Strength.
title: Scientist

name: Explosives
quote: “Eat THIS!!!”
abilities: Blow up Explosives to give your Character +15 Defense until the end of the attack.
title: Atomic

name: First Aid Kit
quote: “I’ve never treated a chainsaw wound to the head before, but what the hell… hand me the iodine!”
title: Creature

name: Flamethrower
quote: “Now we’re cooking with heat!”
title: Man

name: Flashlight
quote: “Great! Now we can see if before it kills us.”
title: Three-Headed

name: Holy Relics
quote: “Holy water, silver bullets, crucifix… this thing’s got everything. It’s like God’s Swiss army knife!”
abilities: Defense = 4 against ‘Supernatural’ Attacks. Aged Vampire Hunter’s Defense = 10 against these attacks and the Old Priest’s Defense = 12.
title: Ritual

name: Old Pickup Truck
quote: “Who’s got the keys?” “Billy.” “And would this be Billy’s severed head in the toilet?”
title: Satan

name: Pistol
quote: Blam! Blam! Blam! Blam! Blam! Blam!… click. click. click. click. click. click... “Crap!”
title: Bride

name: Rifle
quote: “What do you mean guns don’t work?” BLAM! “Works for me.”
title: Tomb

name: Shotgun
quote: “Good… Bad… I’m the one with the gun!”
title: Part IV

name: Roll The Credits
quote: “Look! Sunlight! We made it!”
title: Beach

name: Roll The Credits
quote: “Keep watching the skies!”
title: Blood

name: 3rd Rate Actor
quote: “Um… so, like, what’s my motivation?” “Scale.”
abilities: Play on a Character to make its Defense = 0 until it dies.
title: Outer Space

name: Aim Fer The Head, Boys!
quote: “Eat lead ya brain slurpin’ undead bastard!”
abilities: Add +3 Defense against an Attack or stop one ‘Zombie’ Attack if you have a ‘Gun’ Prop in play.
title: Galaxy

name: Back To The Home
quote: “What are you doing way out here at this time of night, Gramps?”
abilities: Kill one ‘Old’ Character from any Movie.
title: Demonic

name: But It Was Here Just A Minute Ago
quote: “Never fear! Vampires can always be thwarted by… say, has anyone seen my holy amulet of Saint Shrivens?”
abilities: Remove one Prop from play.
title: Eyeball

name: Cabin Fever
quote: “I can’t breathe! I’ve got to get out of here… GAK!”
abilities: One Location’s Defense = -3 until the end of an Attack.
title: Doctor

name: Campy 60’s Crossover
quote: “Abbott & Costello meet the Blob? You’ve gotta be kidding me!”
abilities: Play on your turn to attack with 2 Creatures at the same time, adding their strengths together. The traits and effects from both Creatures apply to the joint Attack.
title: Shadow

name: Cat in The Closet
quote: “Meow.”
abilities: Discard 2 more cards to stop any card (except “Roll the Credits”) as it is being played. That card goes to the discard pile with no effect.
title: Monster

name: Chivalrous But Dumb
quote: “Does this mean I’m not getting any?”
abilities: Kill a ‘Male’ Character in your Movie to save the life of ay ‘Female’ Character.
title: Killer

name: Comic Books To The Rescue
quote: “It’s just like the time Captain Piñata fought the Zombie Queen.”
abilities: Add +3 Defense against an Attack or stop one Attack made against you if you have a ‘Young’ Character in your Movie.
title: Claws

name: Continuity Schmontinuity
quote: “Didn’t that guy get killed twenty minutes ago?”
abilities: Take one Character out of the discard pile and put it into your Movie.
title: Meets

name: Cult Classic
quote: “I can’t believe you haven’t seen ‘Teenage Blood Feast’…”
abilities: Draw 2 extra cards.
title: Unchained

name: Cut!
quote: “What do you mean we can’t afford to do a second take?”
abilities: Stop one Special Effect card as it is being played.
title: X-ray

name: Didn’t See _That_ Coming
quote: “Who knew the kindly old professor was actually a pawn of the evil space mutants…?”
abilities: All players pass their hand to the player on their left. If you play this card on your turn, it ends after the cards are passed.
title: House

name: Director’s Cut
quote: “My motion picture does NOT need a voice over!”
abilities: Reverse the outcome of one Attack. If it failed or was stopped, it is now a success. If it was successful, it is now a failure.
title: Scream

name: Dramatic Music
quote: “Ree… ree… ree… ree…”
abilities: When attacked, play this card to look at the top 5 cards of the draw pile. If any are Special Effects that are useful against this Attack, you may play them. Shuffle the rest of the cards back into the deck.
title: Psychic

name: Editing Room Floor
quote: “But I swear, I’m in this movie!”
abilities: Discard 3 cards to remove one card from any Movie.
title: Werewolf

name: Edjumicated
quote: “I gots me a diploma!”
abilities: One of your Characters becomes ‘Smart’ and gains +2 Defense until it dies.
title: Ancient

name: Flying Saucers
quote: “Actually it’s just a hubcap on some fishing wire.”
abilities: Add +3 Strength to any Attack or double the current Strength of an ‘Alien’ Attack.
title: Planet

name: Good God! They’re Radioactive!
quote: “Hey, turn out the light.” “I did…”
abilities: Double the current Strength of a Creature card.
title: Murder

name: Gotcha!
quote: “Oh look, the old ‘fist out of the fresh grave’ trick.”
abilities: Play immediately after someone plays ‘Roll the Credits’. Play one more round (ending when the player who rolled the credits ends his or her turn) then tally the scores.
title: Giant

name: Ha! Ha! Scared Ya!
quote: “You should see the look on your face…”
abilities: Stop one Attack. The Creature goes back into the Attacker’s hand and the player may not make any more Attacks this turn.
title: Darkness

name: Hey What’s Behind This Door?
quote: “It’s a fine line between stupid and clever.”
abilities: Kill one Character from any Movie as long as they are either ‘Smart’ or ‘Dumb’.
title: Vixen

name: I Can’t Hold It Much Longer!
quote: “I don’t mean to nag, but there’s an 8 FOOT TALL THING OUT THERE AND ALL THAT’S BETWEEN US AND IT, IS THIS DOOR! So do you think you can hurry it up?”
abilities: Add +3 Defense against an Attack or stop one Attack made against you if you have a ‘Large’ Character in your Movie.
title: Lair

name: It Was A Dark And Stormy Night
quote: “Oh great, purple lightning. That’s never a good sign.”
abilities: All Attacks made from now until the end of your next turn are made at double their printed Attack Strength.
title: Terrible

name: It Was Only A Dream
quote: “And you were there… and you were there.”
abilities: Stop one Attack and discard the Creature.
title: Die

name: Let’s Go Skinny Dipping
quote: “While we wait for Billy to get back , why don’t we go for a swim?”
abilities: Kill all ‘Young’ Characters from one Movie.
title: Thing

name: Let’s Split Up
quote: “You stay here by yourself and I’ll go see what happened to everyone else.”
abilities: Play with a Creature card and choose one of your opponent’s Characters. Only that Character’s Defense (including their Props and Location) counts agains the Attack.
title: Death

name: Oh My God, They Got Billy!
quote: “Billy, are you okay? Say something, pal!” “Braaains.”
abilities: Bring a Character back from the discard pile and use it as a ‘Supernatural Zombie’ Attack. Attack Strength = double the Character’s printed Defense.
title: Curse

name: Only the Virgin Survives
quote: “Never have sex in a horror movie. _Ever_!”
abilities: Pick a player and have them kill a Male and a Female Character from their Movie. Can’t be played on a player that doesn’t have both genders in their Movie.
title: Sucking

name: Over Budget
quote: “First day of filming and we’re already out of money?… You are so fired!”
abilities: Stop a Special Effect card as it is being played.
title: Next Door

name: Production Value
quote: “It’s the cleavage. Monsters are distracted by cleavage.”
abilities: Play on a ‘Female’ Character to give her +2 Defense until she dies.
title: Killer

name: Pyrotechnics
quote: “The good news is the Zombies are afraid of fire. The bad news is I accidentally dropped the torch on that pile of oily rags over there…”
abilities: Blow up one Location. For every card you discard when playing Pyrotechnics you may kill one Character who was at that Location.
title: Escape

name: Rayguns
quote: “What do you think this button does?”
abilities: Double or halve (round down) the current Strength of one ‘Alien’ Attack.
title: Carnivorous

name: Reinforcements
quote: “I can control the Armies of the Dead?! Cool.”
abilities: Double the Attacker’s or the Defender’s current Strength for one Attack.
title: Howling

name: Relentless
quote: “Ch-ch-ch-ch-Ah-ah-ah-ah!”
abilities: Play after a successful Creature Attack; the Creature may immediately attack again.
title: Fear

name: Rubber Suit
quote: “Ooooo! Plastic bubble wrap and sticky tape… Where’d you get these costumes, Dr. Who’s yard sale?”
abilities: Cut the current Strength of one Attack in half (round down).
title: Hell

name: Run Away!!!!!
quote: “It’s hard to kill a moving target.”
abilities: Add +5 Defense to your Movie until the end of an Attack.
title: Mummy

name: Scream Queen
quote: “You’re not scared are you, baby?” “Trust me, if I was scared, you’d hear all about it.”
abilities: Play on a ‘Female’ Character. Until she dies, her controller may stop any attack by discarding 3 cards.
title: Caged

name: Sequel
quote: “It wasn’t bad, but it sure doesn’t beat ‘Night of the Undead Coeds Part IV.”
abilities: Stop “Roll The Credits” as it is being played. The turn does not end and play continues as normal.
title: Fungus

name: Snack Bar
quote: “What did I miss?”
abilities: Force one player to miss their next turn. They also have to get you something from the kitchen.
title: Bloodthirsty

name: The Money Shot
quote: “This is the one I’ll be remembered for!”
abilities: Triple the current Strength of one Attack.
title: Zombie

name: The Stars Are Right
quote: “The Prophecy! The Time of Darkness draws near!”
abilities: Double the current Strength of one Creature and give it the trait ‘Supernatural’.
title: Tale

name: They Found The Fuse Box
quote: “Oh great, he ate the light!”
abilities: Play on a Location to make it’s Defense = -15. The Location’s owner may remove this card if he or she skips a turn or puts “The Flashlight” into play. Can’t be played on a player who has “The Flashlight” in their Movie.
title: They

name: They Just Keep Coming
quote: “How’s it look out there?” “Like the set of the Thriller video.”
abilities: Play with any ‘Zombie’ Creature. Look at the top 10 cards of the draw pile. If any have the word ‘Zombie’ on it, the current Strength is doubled and if successful kills 2 Victims. The 10 cards are then shuffled back into the deck.
title: Attack

name: Three Picture Deal
quote: “Somebody has to survive for the sequel.”
abilities: Save one Character (and their Props) from being killed. The player killing the Character may not choose a new Character.
title: Keep

name: Too Stupid To Live
quote: “You’re so stupid it’s painful. Not to you, but to those around you.”
abilities: Kill one ‘Dumb’ Character from any Movie.
title: Alive

name: Walked Out Early
quote: “Well that’s 50 minutes of my life I’ll never get back!”
abilities: Tally up the Defense of your Movie. This total will be added to your final score. Then discard all cards from your Movie and continue play as normal.
title: Grasp

name: We Come in Peace
quote: “Awwww! They look like children.” “How many children do you know who’ve mastered cold fusion and interstellar travel?”
abilities: Add +3 Defense against any Attack or stop an ‘Alien’ Attack. If you have the “Military Officer” in your Movie, you may put that Creature into your hand instead of it going to the discard pile.
title: Children

name: We’ve Seen Your Breasts, Now You Must Die!
quote: “Boooobies… BOOOOBIES!!!”
abilities: Kill one ‘Female’ Character from any Movie.
title: Pit

name: What Do You Mean There’s No Way Out?
quote: “Why are the emergency exits always locked?”
abilities: Remove one Location. If that Location is “The High School”, you may also kill one Character at that Location.
title: Lust

name: Why Won’t You Die?
quote: “I guess getting mulched by a farm combine isn’t as fatal as it used to be…”
abilities: After an Attack is resolved, play this to put the Creature card into your hand instead of it going to the discard pile. You may do this even if you didn’t make the Attack.
title: Swamp
